Mysterious Pyramid of Atum
阿图姆的神秘金字塔

Created by Shadowclaimer
由Shadowclaimer打造


Mod creator Shadowclaimer shares a pharaoh's pyramid from the dimension of Atum. We can almost hear the whistling of the wind and feel the bite of the sand. Do you dare to test yourself in this desert wasteland? Download the Java mod from Curse Forge.
模组创作者shadowclaimer分享一座来自阿图姆维度的法老金字塔。在这片荒无人烟的沙漠里，我们几乎可以听到风之呼啸和感到沙之噬咬。你敢在这片沙漠中证明你自己吗？前往Curse Forge下载这个Java模组吧。

Do you have a fantastic build you’re ready to show off? Feel free to send your screenshots (and a little information about your structure) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and you might see your work here.

你有准备好展示的宏伟建筑吗？请随时将你的截图(和建筑信息) 发送到FeatureMe@minecraft.net ，你的建筑就有可能展现与此。

replies.txt_content: 嗨，这个阿图姆应该是阿图姆2，MCBBS链接贴的是1XD

replies.txt_content: 这模组设定还行 就是东西太少 去他的沙漠维度 随便走走这个模组成就就齐了
